/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy scene below. The sun, positioned in the top right corner of the image, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape. The image is a testament to the vibrancy and energy of urban life in Beijing.
